summary: An email from August 26, 2019, regarding logistical assistance for a hearing in the Epstein case scheduled for the next day. It mentions the expectation of at least 20 victims attending and requests help from agents to support victims and manage press.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the case for which the hearing is being held.

events.title: Epstein Case Hearing
events.description: A hearing regarding the Epstein case was scheduled for 10:30 AM. At least 20 victims were expected to attend, with up to 30 anticipated. SDNY requested agent assistance for victim support and press management.

keyFacts: A hearing in the Epstein case was scheduled for August 27, 2019, at 10:30 AM.
At least 20 victims were expected to attend the hearing, with close to 30 anticipated.
The SDNY requested assistance from agents to help support victims and manage the press at the hearing.
The email was sent on August 26, 2019, to coordinate logistical support for the upcoming hearing.
